No.description: The unique identifier for each mango.

Weight.description: The weight of the mango in grams.

Length.description: The length of the mango in centimeters.

Circumference.description: The circumference of the mango in centimeters.

Grade.description: The quality grade of the mango, determined by certain physical characteristics.

value_dict.A: Grade A represents the highest quality mangoes.
value_dict.B: Grade B represents medium quality mangoes.
value_dict.C: Grade C represents the lowest quality mangoes.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in agricultural data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the physical measurements of the mangoes, please predict the grade of the mango.
prompt.answer_prompt: Grade A[0], Grade B[1], or Grade C[2]?
